trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There were no other sightings in Wilmington on or around April 2nd 2011
Summary: Object with two white lights flying slowly, then turned on a beam of light as if searching.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out on my back deck at 4am and as always looked up at the sky. The morning was clear and the constellations were easily visible especially Orion and Canis Major. Coming out of the south and moving directly north was what seemed to be a high flying plane. I figured it was probably a UPS or FED EX plane, but it didn't have its traditional red and green nav lights. The craft had two white lights, one behind the other and neither blinked. I didn't think much about it until a beam of light turned on and flashed sideways a couple times for about four seconds then turned off. I thought to myself, what plane at that altitude would use a searchlight? There was no sound, and if it was a helicopter looking for something it would have been much lower and more obvious to me at what it was. The object continued to move across the sky to the north and disappeared behind the trees.
